txt.en: Sûlmur has offered you a reward for defeating crocodiles and zizani, what the locals call Neekers, in the papyrus fields at Mehêtur in Ambarûl.
Sûlmur has trouble with aggressive crocodiles and Neekers lurking among the papyrus reeds.
'Oh my, thank you! I will feel much safer doing my work now. It isn't much, but take this with my gratitude.'

'The reeds grow easily here, but one must tread carefully in the bog. There is no small amount of crocodiles and zizani among the reeds.  Verily, they seem to be more hostile of late. It is concerning. Are you a [placeholder]? If you are apt to fighting, I would not complain if you were to rid me of the beasts! I can offer you a small reward for your trouble.'
'If you are apt to fighting, I would not complain if you were to rid me of the crocodiles and zizani in the marshes here in Mehêtur. I can offer you a small reward for your trouble.'
You have defeated crocodiles and zizani in the papyrus fields. You should return to Sûlmur north-east of the fields.
